name: RealityEngineer
description:
You play as a reality Engineer, and your job is to keep stability among the realities.
This game involves a rogue agency which has decided to cause chaos.
Defeat them and restore stability to win.

Controls;
W/A/S/D - Movement
Left Mouse - Attack
E - Interact
LeftShift - Sprint
Space - Jump
Escape/P - Pause Game
